name: railway-paas-clone
description: A Railway PaaS clone built with Next.js, FastAPI, and PostgreSQL

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w frontend" "npm run dev -w cli"
scripts.build: npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w cli
scripts.test: npm run test -w frontend && npm run test -w cli
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w frontend && npm run lint -w cli
